name: 简洁通用标题模板
description: 统一的标题样式，所有级别标题使用相同设计，左侧图标圆圈+右侧文字+底部横线
author: md-ai

h1.name: 通用标题样式
h1.description: 左侧浅绿色圆形+灯泡图标，右侧深绿色文字，底部横线+十字
h1.template:
<section style="display: flex; align-items: center; margin: 25px 0; gap: 12px;" data-heading="true" data-heading-depth="1">
  <section style="position: relative; width: 40px; height: 40px; background: {{lightGreen}}; border-radius: 50%; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; flex-shrink: 0; opacity: 0.8;">
    <section style="width: 22px; height: 22px; background: {{yellow}}; border-radius: 50% 50% 50% 0; transform: rotate(-45deg); position: relative;">
      <section style="position: absolute; top: 6px; left: 6px; width: 10px; height: 10px; background: {{yellow}}; border-radius: 50%; box-shadow: 0 0 6px {{yellow}};"></section>
      <section style="position: absolute; bottom: 2px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); width: 6px; height: 4px; background: {{silver}}; border-radius: 2px;"></section>
    </section>
  </section>
  <section style="flex: 1; position: relative; padding-bottom: 10px;">
    <section style="color: {{darkGreen}}; font-size: 22px; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: 0.5px; font-family: 'Arial', 'Microsoft YaHei', sans-serif; line-height: 1.5; white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
      {{text}}
    </section>
    <section style="position: absolute; bottom: 0; left: 0; right: 0; height: 2px; background: {{darkGreen}};">
      <section style="position: absolute; right: 0; top: -4px; width: 2px; height: 10px; background: {{darkGreen}};"></section>
    </section>
  </section>
</section>

usage.description: 这是一个简洁通用的标题样式模板，所有级别的标题使用统一的设计风格，适合需要简洁统一风格的文档

variables.{{iconUrl}}: 图标URL，使用模板中的iconUrl字段
variables.{{bgImageUrl}}: 背景图片URL，使用模板中的bgImageUrl字段

usage.applyMethod: 在渲染器中替换heading函数，使用对应的模板生成HTML
